groups.title: Fancy RecyclerView
groups.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for some known platforms.

groups.title: Fancy RecyclerView Widgets
groups.description: This extension contains a set of components that can be added when creating a RecyclerView.

fancy_recyclerview_widgets.title: Fancy RecyclerView Widgets
